Title: A Bigger Splash
Writer: David Kajganich (screenplay by), Jacques Deray (based on the film "La piscine" directed by), Alain Page (based on an original screenplay by), Alain Page (based on his novel "La piscine"), Jacques Deray (adaptation), Jean-Claude Carrière (adaptation), Jacques Deray (dialogue by), Jean-Claude Carrière (dialogue by)
Actors: Tilda Swinton, Matthias Schoenaerts, Ralph Fiennes, Dakota Johnson
Plot: The vacation of a famous rock star and her boyfriend in Italy is disrupted by the unexpected visit of an old friend and his daughter.
